attributes.action: New buses with air conditioning fitted for saloon and drivers cab
attributes.background: We want the government to provide the public with better buses and during the summer period our buses should have air conditioning in the saloon and cab. All it will take is a driver to get heat exhaustion and collapse.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what buses to use are a matter for individual bus operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.
